com.vaadin.addon.charts.model
Class PlotLine

java.lang.Object
  com.vaadin.addon.charts.model.AbstractConfigurationObject
      com.vaadin.addon.charts.model.PlotLine
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PlotLine
extends AbstractConfigurationObject

A line stretching across the plot area, marking a specific value on one of the axes.

See Also:
